SELECT D.EDOC_NO, D.EDOC_TITLE, DE.EMP_NAME, D.CREATE_DATE, D.EDOC_DOT_CODE, FN_EDOC_STATUS(E.EMP_NO, D.CREATER, A.APRVL_STATUS, D.EDOC_STATUS) AS EDOC_STATUS FROM TBL_EDOC D JOIN TBL_EDOC_APPROVAL A ON D.EDOC_NO = A.APRVL_EDOC_NO JOIN TBL_EMPLOYEE E ON A.APRVL_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO JOIN TBL_EMPLOYEE DE ON D.CREATER = DE.EMP_NO WHERE D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.EDOC_STATUS = 'DST100' AND E.EMP_ID = #{emp_id}
AND A.APRVL_STATUS = 'W'
AND A.APRVL_STATUS = 'P'
AND A.APRVL_STATUS = 'C'
ORDER BY D.CREATE_DATE

SELECT D.EDOC_NO, D.EDOC_TITLE, DE.EMP_NAME, D.CREATE_DATE, D.FINALIZED_DATE, D.EDOC_DOT_CODE, FN_EDOC_STATUS(E.EMP_NO, D.CREATER, A.APRVL_STATUS, D.EDOC_STATUS) AS EDOC_STATUS FROM TBL_EDOC D JOIN TBL_EDOC_APPROVAL A ON D.EDOC_NO = A.APRVL_EDOC_NO JOIN TBL_EMPLOYEE E ON A.APRVL_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO JOIN TBL_EMPLOYEE DE ON D.CREATER = DE.EMP_NO WHERE D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND NOT(D.EDOC_STATUS = 'DST100') AND E.EMP_ID = #{emp_id}

SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS EMPNAME, D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPTNAME, C.CODE_NAME AS JOBNAME, E.EMP_NO AS EMPNO FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C ON E.POSITION_CODE = C.CODE_NO WHERE E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
